revised_title: Zoological Discoveries and Collections from Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez
tldr: The author presents a detailed account of the petrological, botanical, and zoological collections made in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in 1874-75. The article focuses on the recent fauna, specifically the Echinodermata, and highlights the collection of Sea-urchins and Starfishes from Rodriguez, including new and previously undescribed species. The author also discusses the geographical range and unique characteristics of these species.
